commands.name: take-screenshot-and-search
commands.title: Take Screenshot and Search
commands.description: Take a screenshot and search the image using Google Lens

commands.name: search-selected-image
commands.title: Search Selected Image
commands.description: Search the selected image in Finder using Google Lens

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
